text:
BloomAPI | SF, Seattle, DC, USA only | Full-time | Onsite/Remote

  Senior Engineers: Backend, Frontend & Windows (C#/.NET)
BloomAPI is small and rapidly growing healthcare startup. We're helping to unleash the full potential of Electronic Health Records by allowing doctors to share data with trusted third parties instantly.

Interested in building out some unique technology that will impact the lives of tens of millions of patients?

  * Work from anywhere!

  * Make a difference

  * Have a pivotal role
Get in touch: https://www.bloomapi.com/jobs
